data.title: Who Is Robert De Niro, Ex-Partner of Toukie Smith? Net worth 2023, Age, Education, Career, Parents, Siblings, Love Life, Husband, Children, Bio, Wiki

data.text:
Quick Facts

Full NameDoris A. SmithPopularly Known AsToukie SmithBirthdaySeptember 25, 1952Age70 years oldSun signAriesTraitsPositive- Balanced, Caring, and Elegant

Negative- Detached, Over-thinker, and SelfishBirthplacePhiladelphia, Pennsylvania, USANationalityAmericanEthnicityAfrican-AmericanHeight5 feet 8 inchesEyesBrownHairBrownUniversityFashion Institute of TechnologyParentsWillie Lee Smith (father)

June Eileen Smith (mother)SiblingsWilli Smith and Norman SmithMarital statusSingleSpouseRobert De Niro (Ex-Boyfriend)ChildrenAaron Kendrick De Niro

Julian Henry De NiroProfession Actress and ModelNet WorthUSD 3 millionSocial mediaTwitter

Toukie Smith is a well-known American actress and model. Born Doris A. Smith, she gained popularity for playing the role of Eva Rawley on the NBC sitcom 227.

Toukie Smith has worked as a model for many high fashion brands, including Chanel, Versace, Geoffrey Beene, Issey Miyake, Norma Kamali, Thierry Mugler, and Patrick Kelly.

In addition, Toukie Smith has acted in many TV shows and movies, such as Talkinâ Dirty After Dark, Joeâs Apartment, and The Preacherâs Wife.

How much is the Net worth of Toukie Smith?

Toukie Smithâs estimated net worth in 2023 is about $3 million USD. Toukieâs excellent profession as a model and actress has allowed her to amass such astounding wealth. Because of this, Toukie Smith enjoys a luxurious way of life that most people only imagine.

Early Years: When was Toukie Smith born?

Born on September 25, 1952, Toukie Smith. Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA, is where she was born. She is currently 70 years old. The ironworker Willie Lee Smith and the homemaker June Eileen Smith are the parents of Toukie Smith. June Eileen Smith had prior factory experience. As a result of her lifelong drinking, she passed away in 1986 from liver cirrhosis.

Willie Lee Smith, the father of Toukie, first worked as a butcher before transitioning to an ironworker. Her grandma was a domestic for a household connected to fashion designer Arnold Scaasi. Her grandmother, who frequently sang her a lively song about a fire engine, gave Toukie Smith her name.

Who are the -Siblings of Toukie Smith?

Willi Smith, a well-known fashion designer, is the brother of Toukie Smith. Norman Smith is a second brother she has. Willi Smith, widely regarded as one of the most prominent African-American fashion designers, established his company WilliWear Limited in 1976.

By 1986, WilliWear Limited had successfully generated sales of over $25 million. WilliWear Ltd, regarded as the first clothing company to create both menâs and womenâs apparel under the same name, was renowned for its availability and affordability.

On April 16, 1987, Willi Smith was admitted to Mt. Sinai Medical Center in New York City due to pneumonia and Shigella. The renowned fashion designer passed away from pneumonia caused by Shigella on April 17, 1987.

Afterwards, Willi Smithâs attorney, Edward Hayes, confirmed that the renowned designer had died of AIDS. Smith had no symptoms and was unaware that he had the illness. Only after being admitted to the hospital did he learn that he was HIV positive.

What is the Professional Career of Toukie Smith?

Model Toukie Smith began her career in 1972 while she was a student at the Fashion Institute of Technology. She performed modeling work for a number of prestigious companies, including Chanel, Versace, Geoffrey Beene, Issey Miyake, Norma Kamali, Thierry Mugler, and Patrick Kelly.

Also, Toukie served as a model for WilliWear Limited, the wildly popular clothing line owned by her brother Willi Smith. Toukie Smith also enjoyed success as a print model in addition to this. She appeared in a Yves St. Laurent photo campaign.

Smith has also been featured in numerous high-end fashion publications, such as Vogue, ELLE, Ebony, Cosmopolitan, Redbook, and Seventeen. Toukie Smith, who was named Bloomingdaleâs Model of the Year in 1978, was the second African-American model to have a mannequin created in her likeness.

Toukie Smith has acted in numerous TV shows and motion pictures in addition to her illustrious run as a model. Up to this point, Eva Rawley from the NBC sitcom 227 has been her most well-known role. She has also appeared in I Like It Like That, Me and Him, Miami Vice, and Talkinâ Dirty After Dark.

She has also appeared in Goosed, The Preacherâs Wife, and Joeâs Apartment. In addition, Toukie Smith opened Toukieâs, a restaurant, in New York Cityâs West Village district. Smith subsequently gave up acting and modeling to start a tranquil life in New Yorkâs Battery Park City.

What is the Relationship Status of Toukie Smith? Does she have children?

From 1985 to 1996, Toukie Smith was romantically linked to Oscar-winning actor Robert De Niro. The couple welcomed their twin sons, Aaron Kendrick and Julian Henry, who were born in 1995 via surrogate and in vitro fertilization.

Robert De Niro and Toukie Smith had lost their kid before Aaron and Julian were born. Toukie Smith miscarried shortly after her brother Willi Smith passed away. Toukie Smith then started going to a therapist. She stated:

âI went to a therapistâ¦ you have to get it out so that it doesnât eat you up inside.â

Toukie Smith and Robert De Niro broke up after more than a decade of dating. The extremely secretive couple chose not to share the details of their breakup. Yet, they continue to get along well and make an effort to be good co-parents to their identical sons.

Who Is Robert De Niro, Toukie Smithâs Ex-Partner?

Robert De Niro, an actor and producer, was born on August 17, 1943. Throughout his career, he has received numerous awards, including two Academy Awards, a Golden Globe, the Cecil B. DeMille Award, and a Screen Actors Guild Life Achievement Award. Martin Scorsese and De Niro have worked together nine times.

Robert De Niro was born in Manhattan, New York City, to Virginia Admiral and Robert De Niro Sr. He has received the Kennedy Center Honor and the Presidential Medal of Freedom. De Niro played his first significant role in Greetings in 1968. De Niro received his training at the HB Studio, the Stella Adler Conservatory, and Lee Strasbergâs Actors School.

His performance in the 1973 sports drama Bang the Drum Slowly catapulted him to fame. De Niro and Martin Scorsese collaborated on Mean Streets for the first time in 1973. The movieâs critics praised his performance as âJohnny Boy,â a small-time thief from New York City.

De Niro gained fame and his first Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his portrayal of the young Vito Corleone in The Godfather Part II. In addition, De Niroâs performances in Taxi Driver and The Deer Hunter earned him nominations for the Academy Award for Best Actor.

De Niro won the Best Actor Oscar in 1980 for his portrayal of Jake LaMotta in Martin Scorseseâs historical movie Raging Bull. In the 1982 film The King of Comedy, De Niro portrayed a stand-up comedian. He gained additional recognition for his efforts in the films 1900, Once Once a Time in America, Brazil, The Mission, and Midnight Run.

De Niro received high appreciation for his roles in the movies Goodfellas, Awakenings, and Cape Fear. A Bronx Story, which he directed in 1993, was De Niroâs debut motion picture. Afterwards, he acted in the crime movie âHeat and Casinoâ in 1995.

TriBeCa Productions, a firm that produces movies and television shows, was founded in 1989 by actor De Niro and producer Jane Rosenthal. In 2002, the pair started the Tribeca Film Festival. De Niro also experimented with comedy in movies like Meet the Parents, Wag the Dog, and Analyze This.

De Niro was nominated for an Oscar Award for Best Supporting Actor in 2012 following a succession of unsuccessful box office ventures. For his role in the romantic comedy Silver Linings Playbook, De Niro was nominated. De Niroâs portrayal of Bernie Madoff in The Wizard of Lies earned him a nomination for a Primetime Emmy Award in 2017.

In 2019, De Niro appeared in the criminal epic The Irishman and the psychological thriller Joker.

Robert De Niro Relationships

Robert De Niro married actress Diahnne Abbott prior to his decade-long relationship with Toukie Smith for Silver Linings Playbook. Raphael was born to Abbott and De Niro after their wedding in 1976. De Niro also took in Drena, Abbottâs daughter. De Niro and Toukie Smith began dating after Abbott and De Niro divorced in 1988.

Julian and Aaron Kendrick De Niro, their twin boys, were born during their 1988â1996 relationship. Following their divorce from Toukie Smith, De Niro wed Grace Hightower in 1997. The couple divorced a year after the birth of their son Elliot in 1998.

De Niro and Hightower were able to revive their marriage because their divorce was never legally finalized, and in 2004 they decided to get married once more. In December 2011, they welcomed their surrogate-born daughter into the world. After 20 years of marriage, Hightower and De Niro separated in 2018.
